GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON representation of all available endpoints of the API

GET /api/users.description: Retrieves a list of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: Retrieves data for a specific user by username

GET /api/users/:username/messages.description: Returns all messages sent by a specific user

GET /api/users/:username/study-groups.description: Returns all study groups associated with a specific user

GET /api/subjects.description: Returns a list of all available subjects
